labels: Python HTTP HTTPS Console Script Web Browser Client
name: python-httpclient
short_description: Python library that enables your scripts to browse the internet just like a web browser: Open pages, parse the content, follow links, automatically send Cookies and Referers, follow Redirects and so on.
